author: sussman
msg: An option to prevent paths from losing their changelist associations
(svn_wc_process_committed4):  rev this public func, take new boolean.
(svn_client_commit3):  have deprecated pass NULL into new argument.

author: cmpilato
msg: (SVN2RSS.make_rss_item): Oops!  Remove a debugging statement I

author: cmpilato
msg: Support ranges of revisions in svn2rss.py.
(__init__): Add 'try' block and handle ValueError for revision. Here,
if the revision is not set, set it to the youngest one. Handle one
and range of revisions. Finally, for each revision, add the rss feed
(SVN2RSS.__init__): Keep only max_items items in the feed.

author: sussman
msg: Delete changelist-feature branch, it's been merged to trunk.

author: sussman
msg: * new 'svn changelist' subcommand to edit changelists
* 'svn commit --changelist mychange' commits only the one changelist
There's no need to keep this in a separate branch anymore; we've
already branched for 1.4 release, and these changes aren't
destabilizing.  Followup commits will only be small improvements, such
as making 'svn diff' and 'svn revert' work with --changelist.  (And
